2007 -2014  Previous C ompany

Position: Global Product Di rector  
He define d the strategy of the Process Simulation Suite – Softw are Product line, by leading functional

This product line gr ew by more than 90% in 5 years to 25M $+, and won considerable make share over

and optimization of Off -shore/On -shore facilities.  
 
 2007 -2011
